website_summaries.verdict: With a soft fruity smell, this face wash is a favorite for removing dirt and at a price that won't break the bank for clean skin.
pros: Removes makeup quite well, grabbing unnatural particles from deep within your pores
Known to also help acne without causing the skin to flake
We love the combination of ingredients that leave skin feeling fresh with each use
cons: Some customers would like this product even more if it wasn't textured, as the small beads can scratch your skin

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this product for a full week
customer_reviews.text: I've always had nice skin but recently due to wearing a mask all day; my skin has started to break out. I read reviews on this product and got some feedback from others who have used it and decided to try it for myself. Its been 7 days of consistent use once a day and it has made a huge difference. My skin isn't back to "perfect" but I definitely see good results. I would recommend this for smaller more rash like ance
customer_reviews.author: Nayab

customer_reviews.title: Buy It With The Face Cleanser! BEST COMBO!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is everything! Very bright and punchy. Smells delicious, actually. Works very well. My skin feels very clean and looks radiant after using the scrub. One thing to note - the particles (for exfoliation) are somewhat large. It is not a fine scrub, more of a sugar scrub with those plastic beads in it (which are terrible for the environment, if that is something you are trying to avoid!) I would buy the face cleanser from this same line and use that every day (exactly what I did), and use this scrub a few days per week. I do not recommend that this be used every day, especially for acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: LeSpicyBrownCowTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I have skin of the gods
customer_reviews.text: In my years of using face washes, this takes the cake as the best by far. Of course, you have to know your skin before changing to a different product, or it might make your acne worse. I use this once a day and apply a water based moisturizer by neutrogena right afterwards. At first it might seem like it’s making your acne worse, but it just brought all of the underground acne to the surface and now my face is SO SMOOTH.
customer_reviews.author: H Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great product for acne skin!
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t seen such a great deal anywhere other than Amazon! I’ve been using this product for years! Great product to keep my acne skin under control. I use this product everyday before bed. Doesn’t make my skin dry or anything like that. Loveee the grapefruit smell!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Ehhh, I'm not sure where to begin. Well, this does help get rid of my acne, but it is not very satisfying. This is because EVERY single time after I use it my face gets dry and irritated (but still soft). Tip: if you do not wet your face before applying this then your face will burn like h*ll! This I would recommend to people who have serious acne, because maybe then it won't make your face irritated. My face is really sensitive, so this wasn't really the best choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING ON EARTH FOR ACNE
customer_reviews.text: I seriously fell IN LOVE with this product, I struggled with acne. This cleanser is my go-to, it clears up your acne and if you have acne now and apply everyday the acne gets smaller and no scars. It is a bit drying to use everyday but an amazing moisture solves the problem. I was skeptical because there are a lot of counterfeits about this product but rest assure this one is THE REAL DEAL!
customer_reviews.author: Axcela

customer_reviews.title: Really helped clear up my acne!
customer_reviews.text: I love this acne wash! It really helped reduce my acne with me useing it twice a day by its self. It works even better for me now with a cleanser being used before it! My sisters and I swear be it! Update: I moved it down to 3 stars because while it did have good results, it also started to really hurt our skin. My skin would feel tingly and outright burn sometimes when using it. This didn't start until almost half a year of using it. Still good if on a budget, but it is no longer my go to product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelsey V.

customer_reviews.title: Scrubadubdub
customer_reviews.text: It feels like my face is getting C L E A N E D
customer_reviews.author: WLH

customer_reviews.title: OK face wash
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the product does it job at making my face feel clean. The only thing that I will say about it is that I have to use it every other day. If I use it more than that my skin will crack because I have sensitive skin. If I use the cleanser in the morning then my face will be back to normal and oily in the afternoon. The smell of it is great and I just love how my skin feels after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It smells good and washes the oil off my face pretty good but it drys out my skin. I have to use moisturizer every time. Me and my wife use it and were ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: san

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash. Really deep cleans, smells awesome and keeps my skin clear and prevents breakouts. I use it twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Ann

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Burned my entire face
customer_reviews.text: This literally chemical burned my whole face!!!! DO NOT USE
customer_reviews.author: Maddie Delunas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Only I have to travel alot and I wish the top piece had a cap so I could close it and bring it with me places. I used to get many black heads on my chin weekly. Now I barely get any. I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the smell and texture, noticeable difference in oil control
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for 2-3 years. I use it every morning in the shower and use another product in the evening. It has a wonderful scent and the combination of the scrub particles and the lather it produces give it a nice texture. It does help with oil control/reduction in my T-zone and limits acne blemishes near the surface. It doesn't do much to prevent my occasional cystic acne breakouts because those are so dee under the skin, but they have seemed to clear up faster while using this product as part of my daily regimen.
customer_reviews.author: FemaleUser

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the smell
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to eat grapefruit but I LOVE the smell of this product. I like the little beads in it.
customer_reviews.author: Celena Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best Acne Wash
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years, love the scent & the little beads in it. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: it does dry out my face a bit but thats easily fixed with some moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: make sure to use moisturizer when you use this face wash. it does dry out my face a bit but thats easily fixed with some moisturizer. the smell of the grapefruit is really lovely. i use this twice a day with my clarisonic. ive only been using this for about 3 days so far so i have yet to see all my acne go away but my skin does look better. i was using the philosophy purity one step cleanser before but that did nothing for my acne. hope this works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love using it. I love the scent. It quite removes my acne marks.
customer_reviews.author: prettycx

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash for me
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for more than 4 years and it’s my favorite thing for my face .ive oil skin with acne and this face wash helped me a lot .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swelling and Burning
customer_reviews.text: Smells great I guess. Unfortunately, the morning after using it, I woke up with a swollen face and mild chemical burns. My eyelids are even swollen, even though I was careful to keep it away from them. I'm miserable right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Producto súper bueno! It’s a excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so good and effective for my skin
customer_reviews.author: JenCas

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i got it over three weeks ago and i like it a lot.i find that foaming my face with it and leaving it on my face a few minutes whiles i brush my teeth or do something before finally6 rinsing it off works better.i get monthly breakouts due to the hormones and this has reduced my breakouts very well.the beads make exfoliating my hair so easy and it massages my face too leaving it so smooth.overall a gret product.the smell is ok too,am not a big rfan of pink grateful but i dont mind as long as it controls my breakout
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: This item worked for a couple days, but then completely dried out my skin to the point where I started peeling. Plus it burns more the drier your face gets from this product. My skin is naturally oily, so I can't imagine what it'll do to someone with already dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sienna

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I will buy it again because it was exactly what I wanted. It refreshes and throughly cleans your skin. The delivery is very fast. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a tendency toward more natural products, and am usually skeeved out by skincare products with a long list of ingredients. That being said, this cleanser works so well, that I'm willing to look past that. It smells great, cleans great, and helps keep my skin clear. A winner.
customer_reviews.author: notanothernickname

customer_reviews.title: Makes my face so smooth
customer_reviews.text: It's great. I can see the difference in one wash no exaggeration. Micro beads made my back heads disappear like wow. I wasn't expecting this facial wash to be anything special but wow it's best facial wash I've ever used. Highly recommended! I also use Neutrogena 3in1 acne lotion afterwards. Can't be sure which one but my face looks brighter too.
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: I like the face wash and the scent....but it dried my skin out when I got through half. I didn't realize it was the wash, I finished the bottle while constantly applying lotions and creams to my dried out skin. I stopped using this, everything went back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: I'm 28 years old and my skin used to break out....all the time! It seems no matter what I did, I'd break out. I use this scrub every single morning. Not only does it help control my breakouts and oily skin, it gives me such a refreashing feeling in the morning. Helps me wake up. I dont' think I'll ever switch. I'd recommend this. So amazing!
customer_reviews.author: The Payne's

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst wash face ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst wash face ever! It burned my face and it so red and burned now :( I HAVE TO TAKE ALERGY medication now be careful! !!!
customer_reviews.author: Hayam

customer_reviews.title: This one really works for me....
customer_reviews.text: This one really works on my skin. I have bad acne and I have tried many face wash and scrubs. But this product is perfect for me. And I love the refreshing smell. It doesn't leave face too dry but it cleans very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine G.

customer_reviews.title: Too harsh
customer_reviews.text: My face dries up a lot and becomes irritated with this pink grapefruit line of products. Maybe it works for others but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Peewee Kookie

customer_reviews.title: Great wash and scent
customer_reviews.text: As someone in my 30s, I was looking for something not harsh for my face. I still get occasional acne and I really like this product. It has a great smell and leaves my skin feeling great after washing. I think this is great for any age.
customer_reviews.author: Bizzy Bizzy

customer_reviews.title: Can be drying so use a good moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: Really works and has stopped my breakout, but problems areas remain, so definitely need something else to help with the breakouts. Can be drying so use a good moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Armygal

customer_reviews.title: The best one for my acne combination skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have a combination-acne skin and this face wash seems to help. I been using this product for over 2 years now and didn't find something better. it's leaves my skin smooth and prevent brake outs. What can you ask more from face wash?
customer_reviews.author: Y. Siani

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old son because he is starting to go through puberty and was getting a few bumps on his face. I tried having him use some face cleanser that I use, a much more expensive brand, and his acne got worse. I bought this and within two days of using this wash, the bumps on his face were gone! The pump is perfect for a pre-teen or teen so a ton of product doesn't get used unnecessarily, and is well suited to be kept in the shower, too. Neutrogena products work well and are priced great, and this product is no exception!
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use only Neutrogena facial cleansers on my face because this is what works best for me. I tried a lot of different cleansers and this seems to work best with my oily skin without drying it out.
customer_reviews.author: PeachCobbler

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is amazing but unfortunately I got a damaged product which is reported already... hoping for new one
customer_reviews.author: Pruthvi LS

customer_reviews.title: but it didn't get worse either. I didn't love this but I did ...
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, didn't really clear up any acne, but it didn't get worse either. I didn't love this but I did love the scent!
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: great on my combination skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this product 1-2 times a day, mostly at night, and I love it. When I'm not hormonal with my acne acting up, this cleans all the dirt and oil away to reveal very smooth skin. I just use a natural moisturizer after and I'm set.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Ehh...
customer_reviews.text: Ehh... Smells ok. Not really grapefruit, but not bad. It's an ok cleanser, but could use improvement. Worth the price, but not much more.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Branch

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product, I did a lot of research trying to find the best face wash that wouldn't dry out my skin a lot. I use this twice a day and with in about 2 weeks my face got clearer and felt smoother. Well always use this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for acne.
customer_reviews.text: i have always had acne on my face, i would call i mild, but suffice it to say my skin was not clear. since i started using this wash, my skin had cleared but it left it a bit dry too. nothing a little moisturizer can not solve. :) also, it's great for removing make up.
customer_reviews.author: kathy co

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: smells so good and leaves your skin soft and refreshed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too harsh on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: this smells pleasant but I have sensitive skin and it almost felt like I was putting a chemical peel on my face. it burned very badly, and I would not recommend for someone with sensitive skin like me.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful Pines

customer_reviews.title: Not the face
customer_reviews.text: i used the Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Facial Cleanser, on other parts of my body, and was surprised the Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash, Facial Cleanser, worked to get the non face area clean.
customer_reviews.author: Makita Bonita

customer_reviews.title: I know a lot of people who love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of people who love this stuff. Personally it dries my skin out. Can only use a tiny bit every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Allie`

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not bad, not great ... didnt make my skin peel like other neutrogena products have, so that's a plus
customer_reviews.author: tinylion

customer_reviews.title: If you want exfoliation, mix brown sugar into your face wash 2 times a week.
customer_reviews.text: Something weird happens when you soap it on your face. The smell starts off nice and then smells like dirt. Gross. The exfoliation also does nothing. Special tip: Adding brown sugar to whatever facewash you already use once or twice a week with a light touch is the best exfoliator you can get. It is gentle, no bad beads for the environment, and can be used with any face product you use. I use the plain neutrogena face wash with brown sugar and its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Beads Up The Nose
customer_reviews.text: I liked this facewash because it smelled good, and it felt like my face was clean when I was done washing. However, the beads always went up my nose for an unpleasant feeling, and it seemed no matter how hard I tried it always somehow got up there! It is also difficult to wash around the eyes for the same reason.
customer_reviews.author: Joline Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me
customer_reviews.text: I never by anything but Neutrogena any more as it always seems to leave my skin the healthiest. I buy this one because it comes with the most product in it and I have never suffered from bad acne. I do however use this facewash daily to prevent the rouge pimple, and in that the product succeeds. I don't know how it works for actual acne, and therefore, cannot personnally recommend it for use as such. For a daily face wash for an adult, I think this product is great and have been sold on it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it says it will do, especially if you have acne
customer_reviews.author: dawn graves

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife; she loves it. She uses it regularly and it smoothes her skin. Thanks Neutrogena for the great product and to Amazon for great pricing and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, the smell is pleasing and it helps keep my skin clear.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My daughters use this and it works great. They love this over any other soap they've used. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Decent daily cleanser with a convenient pump
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of the grapefuit and it does a decent job removing oil. Just need to use a small amount to get a good cleansing. If use too much, your skin might feel really dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rickuster

customer_reviews.title: I'll use it my life time
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me! I don't say it cures my acne 100% but this helps remove dirt/bacteria. I have sensitive skin. This product doesn't hurt me - it makes me feel fresh - it doesn't dry my skin. These are all I expect from a scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Rajashree Balasubramanian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love this cleanser and brand, but the bottle leaks when i put it in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi

customer_reviews.title: Helped a lot
customer_reviews.text: Ever since hitting college I've had really bad break outs, and this is the only thing I've found that helps. Hopefully I will fully clear up!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeccah Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been using it as my daily cleanser for over a year now and my skin has never looked better. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and refreshed every day.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: This face scrub smells very very delicious and it works great as a facial cleanser. I use it daily, usually 2-3 times! I would definitely recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaGrant713

customer_reviews.title: Acne Under Control
customer_reviews.text: I've been dealing with hormonal acne since getting an IUD four months ago. I bought this product + the facial scrub and lotion from the same line. Started using about 2 weeks ago and my skin is like 90% better - this definitely helped to get my acne under control (THANK GOODNESS)
customer_reviews.author: CNW

customer_reviews.title: Works great and with foaming a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Have to say that I love it. Dries my skin but not too much. Found this when searching for. The foaming action is great. Use less and covers more, cleans just as well. Has microbeads which I like but some may want to avoid. Works great and does what it's supposed to. Dries my face but not too much so absolutely perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: T. Steyaert

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrub! I have a Clarisonic and this works great with it! My skin feels soft without being dried out and a little bit goes a long way! I have oily, acne-prone skin and this scrub has made my skin look fantastic! I very rarely get breakouts now. This is at least worth a shot!
customer_reviews.author: hmarie2

customer_reviews.title: Best Face Wash Around!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both prone to breakouts and this is the only face soap we've both been able to use that does the job without drying out our skin. It feels good going on and my skin feels fresh and tingling after I rinse it off. Does a great job controlling breakouts also. Just a really well made product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Flohre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how clean, clear, & fresh my face feels after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have had skin problems since puberty and several of the dermatologists I have visited highly recommended this brand to me. I use it twice a day and can say for sure that it helps clear your skin and keep it clear. Everyone comments on how young I look and want to know what I use for skin care. I am 39 and people swear I look in my late 20s.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Rew

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash- Pink Grapefruit
customer_reviews.text: I will always love this product!!! I love the smell and the forumula is so gentle, yet I feel like my pores are being exfoliated. Its so refreshing and clean !
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I don't have alot to say, because I'm still only using for about two weeks. But I'm enjoying. Cleans the skin thoroughly; lather well, which I love; do not dry the skin too much
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: The size is great
customer_reviews.text: I certainly was getting my money's worth for the size and I think the price is very manageable. It leaves my face feeling very soft, though it does dry it up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Gentle n fresh!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a gentle facial scrub but my skin loves this acne wash. I love the smell of the grapefruit too. Wakes me up and energizes my day. I also use it for my whole body- like a scrub. But foaming? Meh. Can't make a big enough bottle for me.
customer_reviews.author: marimars

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only downside is that it leaks if you want to bring it anywhere, so for travel you have to push the pump all the way down and turn it to make it lock.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I did like this product. As soon as I started using it, I noticed a decrease in acne. I would suggest buying this product, and it is also very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Its great! My skin feels fresh and clean but when ...
customer_reviews.text: Its great! My skin feels fresh and clean but when I first started using it, my skin would dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a product used daily in our home. Works great to keep skin clear. My daughter who is acne prone used for a couple days and we were so happy to see how fast and effective it was! Nice cooling feeling on the skin!
customer_reviews.author: Ansley T

customer_reviews.title: My favorite acne wash
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells absolutely amazing and does not dry out my skin or leave a residue. I'm a huge fan...
customer_reviews.author: studentNQ

customer_reviews.title: keep the oil free and cheap!
customer_reviews.text: i usually got oil on my noise, but after using that, it becomes better. and the pore on my face also becomes less
customer_reviews.author: peachwj

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing! This is my second purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! This is my second purchase. I have very oily skin in which causes pimples. I use this product because it keeps my pores clean and free of oil, also it makes my face squeeky clean. I do not develop any pimples when I use this product everyday. I've used so many soaps and liquids in the past to control my breakouts, none has worked as good as this.! I use this after removal of my makeup with a spin brush to really remove any residue that may be left behind, a little goes along way. The only thing I have to say negative about this product is the price.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to anyone with mild acne. It is not too hash. It smells great and makes skin smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good and hope it is going to fulfill my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Miraf

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cleanser. I use one pump and it is not drying at all. I will definitely be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Liang

customer_reviews.title: FULL OF PLASTIC MICROBEADS - Bad for our environment
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE on December 11, 2014: I few months ago I read the very bad news that plastic microbeads - the kind in this face wash - are turning up in our rivers and lakes. Search for reports on plastic microbead pollution for details. I'm very sorry for my part in the problem, and I immediately discontinued use of this product and discarded it (in its packaging so at least the beads won't run wild in the waste stream). I now use facial cleansers that don't contain plastic microbeads.
customer_reviews.author: Free Range Clickin'Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but use it once per day.
customer_reviews.text: I've read other reviewers mention that this product is overly drying. I will say that I love the scent. And, I love the very clean feeling after using it. My pores feel tight after I use it. It's very refreshing. As a precaution, I do use it once per day or less, just because I am prone to dry skin. But, I think drying could be the case with any product with similar ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: mommabear

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for 2 days and already feeling the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Al Balushi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful all around
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for my skin (combination/oily)! It leaves my skin feeling smooth, not dried out, and my acne, which is fairly mild, has virtually disappeared because I constantly use it. I prefer this face wash over the original Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash because this one has a nice scent and seems to soothe my face more, never leaving it dry or irritated. I recommend this product to anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I've used the product before and like that it helps me maintain clear skin and is not harsh. You do need to use sunscreen on your face if using the product as it will make your skin sun sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! I used for 4-5 days->Fighting pimples since 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I'm really upset with this product. I used it on my face for 4-5 days(twice a day). Every thing seemed normal,and then little pimples(the puss kind) started appearing on my cheeks and chin/jaw line. They din't seem to stop. I immediately stopped using the product. The pimples dint stop at all. Its been 2 weeks now! The pimples finally stopped coming. But they left my face in a bad condition. I never had pimples like these (at this rate) before. For people with sensitive skin, I strongly recommend NOT using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi

customer_reviews.title: Been using for a few years, still going strong
customer_reviews.text: You'd think at some point you grow out of getting small zits, right? Maybe some skin types don't, like mine, and I was tired of it. When I buckled down and decided to use a single set of products religiously morning and evening, I picked up the Neutrogena grapefruit wash (morning), scrub (evening) and assorted moisturizers. I can definitely claim it evened out my skin and there are almost no breakouts. Good stuff, please don't ever change!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Hawser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Acne solution
customer_reviews.text: Another great product from Neutrogena. Pros: I have closed comedonal acne so drying and peeling skin is good to get the sebum out. Been using this for 3 weeks and they are getting smaller. Will have to use for loger to see results though. Cons: Pretty drying, but that's how pimples get washed away! Bottom line: Affordable, one for the washes that actually work for comedonal acne. Don't use for sensitive and dry skin though, and expect dryness. After all, it has salcylic acid.
customer_reviews.author: SocMon

customer_reviews.title: A truly great product
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a try as I had developed rosacea and my nose and side of nose area were constantly breaking out. I absolutely love this product. It cleared up my skin in a very short amount of time and as long as I use morning and night, my skin has not broken out again. It does tend to dry the skin, so use a good non oil based moisturizer. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L

customer_reviews.title: Works with sensitive and combination skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have combination sensitive skin so I needed something that would be gentle enough to cleanse without making my skin retaliate. I love this face wash! It smells amazing and gives me that perfect pick-me-up in the morning. It clears the oil off my skin without over-drying. I've been using this for a while (about 2 years now) and have been satisfied and mostly clear-skinned.
customer_reviews.author: kjmwv

customer_reviews.title: Best facial wash for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Used for years, continues to be the most effective facial wash for my oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: SuzB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fresh fruity Grapefruit smell of this product and have found great deals on it here on Amazon. Both my husband and I use this product--in fact, we had it on auto-order (until too many began piling up!). Be aware that this is not a particular moisturizing product, but I don't think that is really what it is aiming at anyway. The scrubby beads feel nice and eliminate the need to use a wash cloth to wash my face.
customer_reviews.author: Benice

customer_reviews.title: Good face wash for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty loyal when it comes to Neutrogena products, and this wash met my quality expectations. I use it in tandem with the Pink Grapefruit Scrub, and overall I can say I am very happy with the appearance of my skin; it's clear and I am definitely less oily than I was before I started using it. The only thing I am not too crazy about is the scent; while it's nice, it's a bit too strong at times. But I guess if the smell doesn't appeal to you, just opt for the non-scented Oil-Free Acne Wash.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My 12 and 14 year old really like this face wash
customer_reviews.text: My 12 and 14 year old really like this face wash ...definitely a great help in the teen fight against acne :-) My younger daughter has sensitive skin and only used 2 or 3 times a week because she says it is a little harsh for her ...my son uses every day.
customer_reviews.author: JourneyBlessing

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Smells soooo good
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Smells soooo good! and its oil free which is amazing for people like me who have oily skin or very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: For Senstive-Acne Prone Skin
customer_reviews.text: I usually have my mild acne under control, but this summer things have changed. I find that my old routine wasn't working as well as before. So, I decided to leave the face bar soap alone and go liquid. Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Facial Cleanser was my first choice, and I'm glad I chose it. From my first wash, I could really feel a difference. I could tell that it was working. I use it twice a day--morning and night. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Item works well and as promised. Can only use 1x per day in the winter due to drying of the skin but that is true of most products with salicylic acid. Also works for a wide range of skin/age concerns. In our house, a 16 year old girl, 30 year old man and a 39 year old woman all use it and like it
customer_reviews.author: J. Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I love that this scrub smells nice and is gentle, but doesn't seem to be helping my breakouts yet hence the 4 stars. I haven't had it long so I'll update as needed over the next few weeks. The price is right and it seems gentle so I am relatively happy, but ready to stop breaking out like a teenager :(
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and Neutrogena has long been known for their products being great on sensitive skin. This is one of those times. After I use it my face always feels super clean and refreshed, even slightly exfoliated due to the small microbeads. It has definitely cleared up my acne a little bit. This is by no means a prescription medication. My acne has not magically gone away. However, when I use this regularly it is definitely significantly reduced. The smell is also pleasing, due to the citrus scent, which smells really clean and nice. I would recommend this to anyone, particularly people who have sensitive skin, for a once or twice daily facial wash.
customer_reviews.author: Plant Happy

customer_reviews.title: Only facewash I use
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash, have been using it for over three years now. This face wash helps combat acne and prevent it while slowly evening out the tone in the face and being gentle all at the same time. Won't stray from this face wash and is a must have in my personal regiment.
customer_reviews.author: Khrystian Ball

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Scrub, Pink Grapefruit, Value Size, 6.7 Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:6.7 Ounce| Style:Pink Grapefruit Foaming ScrubNeutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Pink Grapefruit Foaming Scrub powerfully clears blemishes and blackheads with maximum strength Salicylic Acid acne medicine plus an uplifting blast of grapefruit. With 100% naturally derived grapefruit extract and vitamin C, Neutrogena Oil-Free Acne Wash Pink Grapefruit Foaming Scrub features that smooth away roughness without over-drying or irritating your skin.
feature_bullets: Meyers 33 Oz Lavender Liquid Hand Soap Refill.
Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Lavender Liquid Hand Soap Refill Will Ensure That You Never Run Out Of Hand Soap
Packaged In A Handy Pouch And Made With 40% Less Plastic Than Traditional Plastic Refills Containers.
